title: Cuban-Style Yuca
ingredients: 2 pounds yuca, peeled and sliced lengthwise
method: Step 1: Place yuca into a pan and fill with enough water to cover. Stir in salt. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, cover, and cook until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain; place yuca on a serving plate.
Step 2: Meanwhile, place olive oil, onion, garlic, and lemon juice into a pan. Cook over medium heat for about 5 minutes.
Step 3: Pour the hot olive oil mixture over the yuca; serve immediately.
